document.discussion_title: IFSEC – World leading exhibitors under one roof
document.topic_text: IFSEC – World leading exhibitors under one roof Posted April 25, 2016 by Heather Hook You can meet the suppliers of the latest security products face-to-face and test their claims by putting their new products through its paces, only at IFSEC International taking place in London from 21 – 23 June 2016 at ExCel Centre. Find the perfect solution to the problems your business is facing by speaking directly to the technical specialists. Cut through the noise and pre-book meetings using the Meetings Service , freeing up more of your time to explore the rest of the show. Speak to Kedacom, a world leading IP CCTV solutions developer and manufacturer, about their new Recognition Tracking Systems, designed for monitoring open public areas and has the ability to track 60 moving targets within 120 sqm. The software developers, Entelec Control Systems, built the new Sky-Walker Integration Platform as a solution to integrate your security, safety and building management systems. It delivers financial service benefits to help boost ROI. CAME | Bpt, a leading manufacturer of automation systems, will be in the new Physical Perimeter Zone. Meet to discuss the latest automatic gates, parking barriers, retractable bollards, turnstiles and tubular motors for your business needs. There will be thousands of products on display and hundreds of exhibitors, so you can be certain that you will find the ideal solution for your business whether you need better access control, video surveillance, intruder alarms, physical and perimeter security, home automation and smart buildings, IT and cyber security, or integrated security systems! Don’t miss your opportunity to meet them. Your badge also gives you access to the fire, facilities, service management and safety & health exhibitors located next door to IFSEC. Book your spot now: http://bit.ly/1NMdlCN
